metadata.synopsis: You come upon the myconid guards. They warn the sovereign of your presence telepathically, and it begins to speak to you. This should be creepy, hallucinatory.

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *You are swallowed by a chorus of turbulent music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of an entire collective.*

14.speaker: Restless Myconid
14.text: ((*Sovereign. they have come. they are here*))

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *The choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

50.speaker: Narrator
50.text: *You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if seeing the vision in their head.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I sense your fear. I've come to aid you.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Focus on your parasite and connect with the sovereign.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *The parasite is quiet. You feel no bond with the creature.*

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Tell the truth of the parasite. You only seek safe passage in your search for treatment.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Let me pass. I've come for the runaway gnome.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I am a traveller seeking adventure.

6.speaker: Narrator
6.text: *Fungal roots weave through your mind, seeking your true intent.*
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if to see the vision.

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *Then the sovereign drones a new melody, cautious but welcoming.*
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range.

42.speaker: Narrator
42.text: ((*I can mend neither skin nor spirit. but we still might commune*))

43.text: ((*descend to me. let us speak in flesh*))
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range. (Custom cameras required)

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *The persistent music coaxes you forward. The sovereign expects you.*

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *Fungal roots weave through your mind, poking you, warning you...*

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Seek understanding. Focus on the sovereign's song.

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *You detect a distinct quiver in every note. These creatures have experienced recent tragedy.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *You discern no information or intention in the sovereign's song.*

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Counter with your own memory. Duergar builders, not burners. Not rot.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: My purpose is private. Let me pass, and I will leave you unharmed.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: The Underdark is my home - I don't need your permission to pass.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I have no 'purpose'. I simply am. That is enough.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Hum a peaceful tune in harmony with the sovereign.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: These tricks of the mind don't frighten me - I'll kill you!

25.speaker: Restless Myconid
25.text: ((*the Sovereign spoke its word. you will obey*))

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *You are swallowed by a chorus of frenzied music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of a myconid collective.*

31.speaker: Restless Myconid
31.text: ((*Sovereign. they have come. the Rot has come*))

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *The fright-choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: ((*I am Sovereign. and you are duergar. you are Rot*))

52.text: ((*I am Sovereign. and you bring the Rot. duergar*))

60.speaker: Narrator
60.text: *You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Conjure tranquil memories in hopes of calming the sovereign.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Kneel in submission. My duergar companion means you no harm.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: If I wanted you dead, you would be. Don't tempt me.
